data.text: I am not one for farewells, so it is not goodbye but ‘au revoir’. Je suis amoureux de l'Europe et lui resterait fidèle. I will never cease to lend my voice and my heart to Europe. @vonderleyen, I wish you all the best. Passen Sie auf Europa auf. 🇪🇺 https://t.co/DxW6LjXjB3

Congratulations @vonderleyen! With today’s vote, the @Europarl_EN reaffirmed its unwavering trust in you & your team #VdLCommission. A new journey starts for you today. I know that under your leadership, we will see a stronger, greener and more digital 🇪🇺 I wish you all the best.

En hommage aux soldats français, je présente mes condoléances émues aux familles et aux proches des victimes, @EmmanuelMacron et à l’ensemble de la nation 🇫🇷. C’est l’Europe toute entière qui est en deuil car c’est l’armée française qui défend l’honneur et la sécurité de l’Europe https://t.co/EYILSiq6eo

🇪🇺🇷🇴 Congratulations, @KlausIohannis on your re-election as President. The strong support of the 🇷🇴 people for your unequivocally pro-European choices for the country comes at an important time in Europe. I know I can count on #Romania's active role in furthering the 🇪🇺 project. https://t.co/zc5j706kqt

Congratulations, dear @donaldtusk, on your election as President of the @EPP. Throughout your career you have given much to the 🇪🇺 project and I am sure that you will continue to serve a united Europe - one that is firmly based on democracy, the rule of law and social justice. https://t.co/mJRiEDFM6m

La chute du mur était un moment déterminant pour la politique mondiale et le début d'un nouveau chapitre — pour notre continent européen et pour moi personnellement. #MauerFall30

https://t.co/gC2sj4D3YA https://t.co/hD1chS9jas

The fall of the Berlin Wall was a milestone for world politics and the start of a new chapter, both for the continent of Europe and for me. #MauerFall30

https://t.co/lK05F61J7j https://t.co/qCcSH6fZRa

Der Mauerfall war ein Meilenstein der Weltpolitik und der Anfang eines neuen Lebensabschnittes – für unseren europäischen Kontinent und für mich persönlich.  #MauerFall30

https://t.co/xr59yGJukM https://t.co/QehJatCKbI
Congratulations Ludovic Orban. I am confident the “spirit of Sibiu” and our desire for a stronger Europe at home and abroad will continue to inspire future action. https://t.co/6FrAbKYcz5

Danke, merci, thank you to the excellent Directors-General of the @EU_Commission! Alleine sind wir nichts, zusammen sind wir alles. You did not cease to inspire me. Les institutions ne sont rien sans les hommes et les femmes qui les font vivre. 🇪🇺 https://t.co/8Span9XcQp
Merci de tout cœur à tout l’équipe #TeamJunckerEU. I could never have done it without you! Ich werde euch ewig dankbar sein. 🇪🇺 https://t.co/mDTlJd33jt

Ich habe mich sehr gefreut @MartinSchulz wiederzusehen. Wir sind gemeinsam für ein Europa eingetreten, in dem Grenzen verbinden statt zu trennen. Danke, dass Du stets ein Verbündeter für Europa warst und mir ein Freund bist, lieber Martin! https://t.co/MUEiXBI3SM
Merci Mario, graze mille Mario, you have done Europe a great service! https://t.co/kWDhGj3EMH

.@Sophie_Wilmes, félicitations pour votre nomination à la tête du gouvernement 🇧🇪. Je sais pouvoir compter sur la contribution de la #Belgique pour faire avancer l’Europe 🇪🇺, comme cela a toujours été le cas par le passé. Gefeliciteerd. https://t.co/EGe8BxOWfB

Long live Europe! Lang lebe Europa! Vive l’Europe! 🇪🇺

https://t.co/85HvMjWlR5 https://t.co/avBMea3TE9

🇪🇺🤝🇬🇧 Where there is a will, there is a #deal - we have one! It’s a fair and balanced agreement for the EU and the UK and it is testament to our commitment to find solutions. I recommend that #EUCO endorses this deal. https://t.co/7AfKyCZ6k9

This was my last #TripartiteSocialSummit, but work on the social dimension of the #EU must go on. I am happy that we can build on the European Pillar of #SocialRights and that the #EULabourAuthority starts its work today. It wouldn’t be Europe if it was not social. https://t.co/Dy3TWaxXQe

Willy Helin nous a quitté ce matin. Aux cotés d'Etienne Davignon pendant plus de 10 ans puis comme chef de représentation de la Commission, il n'a jamais cessé de défendre et d'expliquer l'Europe. A son épouse Solange et à leurs 2 enfants, je présente mes condoléances attristées.

Danke, thank you, @EU_Commission ambassadors! Merci pour la façon dont vous m’avez représenté dans vos pays. You have made me proud. You have made #Europe proud. Viel Erfolg für die 🇪🇺 Zukunft! https://t.co/1AtpVpctxq

I am shocked by the brutal attacks in #Halle – on this day, Yom Kippur, the holiest day of the year in Judaism. My thoughts and prayers are with the families and friends of the victims. On this day we stand in solidarity with the #Jewish community. https://t.co/nle2TKKv9p

Pierre Bocev m’a accompagné durant presque toute ma vie politique. Il m’a aidé à trouver ma place et mon chemin en Europe. Longtemps, j’aurais mémoire de ce grand Monsieur qui fut un homme profondément bon.

 https://t.co/UHQuu2We7p

Good working dinner with @jensstoltenberg and @eucopresident. #EU and @NATO are the most natural partners. Working hand in hand for a common #security and #defence. Proud of what we have achieved together over the past 5 years. 🇪🇺🤝 https://t.co/R9SQAXZsos

Congratulations @antoniocostaps on winning the general election in #Portugal. Thank you for the support and #solidarity shown by Portugal to European partners. I am confident you will form a government that will ensure 🇵🇹 remains an active and committed member of our 🇪🇺. https://t.co/CcU8yQEnHk

Très sincères condoléances à la famille du Professeur Freitas do Amaral. Un vrai chrétien démocrate qui a eu un rôle déterminant dans la consolidation de la démocratie au Portugal. https://t.co/KuzenNhuvl

I am honoured to receive @AmChamEU’s Bridge-Builder award. It symbolises a lot of what I have tried to achieve these last five years, in fact all my life. Our transatlantic relationship is first and foremost a 🇪🇺🇺🇸 friendship. It is not about hopes and dreams. It is a necessity. https://t.co/gnGEa4uGJR

Congratulations @sebastiankurz on his clear victory in the #NRW19. Austrian voters placed a lot of trust in him on that election day. I wish him every success in building a stable government, pursuing a pro-European course. 🇪🇺 needs a strong 🇦🇹 voice to tackle common challenges. https://t.co/B8VCpiofrj

Aujourd'hui, l'Europe perd une de ses figures de proue, la France un grand homme d'État et moi un ami fidèle. Jacques #Chirac était un homme de fortes convictions, celles des valeurs humanistes de fraternité, de respect de la tolérance.
https://t.co/HcdpxsRHa9

Congratulations @KGeorgieva on your selection as Managing Director of @IMFNews! I am proud that a former Vice-President of the @EU_Commission will assume this important responsibility. @EU_Commission looks forward to continuing our close and productive relationship with the #IMF. https://t.co/k3LqYZb7l2

🇮🇹🇪🇺 I am convinced that Italy will be able to play an important role in addressing these truly European challenges, living up to its responsibility as a founding Member of our Union.

👇 My congratulatory letter to @GiuseppeConteIT on his re-appointment. https://t.co/cte9mSV5HH

.@PMHoncharuk, @eucopresident and I warmly congratulate you on your appointment as Prime Minister of #Ukraine. You can count on the #EU’s continued steadfast support to Ukraine. https://t.co/agZTXwY00x

Erinnern für die Zukunft. Today I am reminded how grateful I am to live on a peaceful continent. As we mark 80 years since the start of #WW2, we must remember that living up to Europe’s rallying cry - never again war - remains our eternal duty. L’Europe, c’est la paix. https://t.co/2kCmNDqEc8

Congratulations, @KGeorgieva on your nomination as Europe’s candidate for Managing Director of the #IMF. You have all of the qualities needed to make an effective contribution to the IMF’s mission. Честито! https://t.co/Chgs3S5U61

Aujourd’hui la Tunisie a perdu un grand homme d’Etat. En mon nom personnel et au nom de la @EU_Commission je tiens à présenter à la famille du Président Caïd #Essebsi et à l’ensemble du peuple tunisien mes condoléances les plus sincères. https://t.co/RHfd1dGfpy

@BorisJohnson, please accept my warmest congratulations on your appointment as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. 
I look forward to working together in the best possible way. https://t.co/27fdjfxrVs
RT @JosephMuscat_JM: We always found in @JunckerEU an honest broker, ready to listen and to decide. His contribution to #Europe is second t…

.@presidentmt and @JosephMuscat_JM: Grazzi minn qalbi! I am truly proud and grateful to receive the award of National Order of Merit. I want to pay tribute to #Malta and its people for defending our European values. Malta, inħobbok! 🇲🇹🇪🇺 https://t.co/Bvcwr27qf4

Félicitations @vonderleyen! Endlich steht die erste Frau an der Spitze der @EU_Commission. This job is a huge responsibility and a challenge. I am sure you will make a great President. Willkommen zu Hause! 🇪🇺
I just interviewed Ioan Mircea Pașcu, proposed candidate for Commissioner from #Romania. https://t.co/KBEiYiIIcb
I just interviewed @kadrisimson, proposed candidate for Commissioner from #Estonia. https://t.co/WeQmALKkRL

The #EU's partnership with Ukraine is one of mutual solidarity and friendship. It is also one that is flourishing. I have always said -and always proved- that the more #Ukraine reforms, the more the #EU lends its support. 
We will always stand by you. 
https://t.co/2yUqHJXXrV https://t.co/2iJh0epmSh

🇬🇷🇪🇺 @kmitsotakis, I would like to congratulate you on your clear victory in the legislative elections. You know my personal attachment to Greece and its people who have endured so much over the last decade. The dignity, resilience & European commitment of Greeks commend respect. https://t.co/JrL8Si94dN

Kiitos, @AnttiRinnepj for your warm hospitality! Europe needs Finland because you are experienced, pragmatic, down-to-earth and cool-headed – that is exactly what we need in the next coming months. Looking forward to a successful @EU2019FI 🇪🇺🇫🇮 https://t.co/i1FV53sWJJ
Je viens d’apprendre le décès de Pol Cruchtens. C’est une lourde perte pour le Grand-Duché. Longtemps j’aurai mémoire de lui.

Delighted to welcome @vonderleyen with open arms to the @EU_Commission today. A true European, we are on the same page when it comes to speaking up for 🇪🇺 interests. 
Ich freue mich, Hand in Hand mit ihr zusammenarbeiten. Je lui souhaite le meilleur au l’@Europarl_EN. https://t.co/nCraHdAGrB

Congratulations to my good friend @AbeShinzo for a successful and efficient #G20OsakaSummit2019 ! United to address major global challenges. Historic day with the conclusion of the #EUMercosur trade pact: 🇪🇺 stands for the rules-based international order.

https://t.co/JrK9IVIGgz https://t.co/ihCOC90yn5

With @mauriciomacri, #EU and #Mercosur leaders we stand as proud co-owners of the #trade agreement between the 🇪🇺 and Mercosur. United, we delivered for our people and our businesses - 20 years to the day after negotiations began. Un dia historico. 

https://t.co/ntPhejUMsE https://t.co/VVgwsj1LQX

#Mercosur #trade deal done! A historical moment. In the midst of international trade tensions, we are sending a strong signal that we stand for rules-based trade. Largest trade agreement 🇪🇺 has ever concluded. Positive outcome for environment & consumers.

https://t.co/AE5z78c81J

#G20Osaka: Our message to the world is clear and simple: Europe is committed to upholding – and where necessary updating – the rules-based global system. And we are ready to work with everyone to make that happen.

https://t.co/kVo5Yxq48t https://t.co/o4XhN6isDI

🇪🇺🇩🇰 Congratulations, Mette #Frederiksen on your appointment as Prime Minister of #Denmark. I look forward to working closely with you and the new Danish Government on the strategic priorities for the EU and its Member States. https://t.co/yF3F8R5tmW

Nous présentons aujourd’hui le 3e volume de l’histoire de la @EU_Commission 1986-2000. Je suis gagné par la nostalgie. Je reste fier d’avoir été une petite pièce de quelque chose de bien plus grand. https://t.co/3huoUO4xLH
It is excellent news that @VDombrovskis will continue to be part of my @EU_Commission. Europe needs Valdis. https://t.co/tZpCO4Kjmc

In creating the #euro, we turned an improbable aspiration into a daily reality for millions of Europeans. The banknotes in our pockets are worth far more than the numbers written on them. They are the tangible symbol of a united Europe. 
#ECBForum 
https://t.co/S7r001RFMO https://t.co/b27oTfs8TS

Ich fühle mich geehrt, den #PointAlphaPreis an diesem besonderen Ort entgegenzunehmen. Ich stehe gerne an einer Grenze, die es nicht mehr gibt. Der Preis ist eine Erinnerung daran, dass wir Menschen Grenzen überwinden können. Und er ist auch Auftrag, gegen neue Mauern zu kämpfen. https://t.co/1bheQOmPox

Draga @KolindaGK dragi @AndrejPlenkovic hvala vam za srdačno gostoprimstvo u vašoj prekrasnoj zemlji! I commend 🇭🇷 remarkable 🇪🇺 journey. Impressed by the preparation for #EU2020HR. Our Union will continue to stand by you every step of the way, including Schengen and € accession https://t.co/azwMXy2glF
Congratulations @AnttiRinnepj. The new government’s unequivocal pro-European stance is very encouraging. I look forward to our good and close cooperation. https://t.co/Jutsn8NRa9

Felicitações ao meu bom amigo @antonioguterres - um verdadeiro construtor de consensos e incansável promotor dos Direitos Humanos e dos valores da cooperação internacional. Defending 🇪🇺 unity, tolerance and the multilateral rules-based system is our common conviction. #Karlspreis https://t.co/Ka0x56lsHI

Congratulations President-elect Egils Levits. I am confident your knowledge and experience will greatly benefit both #Latvia and the #EU. I look forward to working closely with you. https://t.co/GueiS1iDTK

My heartfelt congratulations to @GitanasNauseda. I greatly look forward to meeting you and to working closely together. 
#Lithuania https://t.co/zRI0hq3yFM

I just voted 🇪🇺🗳. Vote like it matters! Every vote counts.

#EUelections2019 
#ThisTimeImVoting https://t.co/aSFgqBEMjm

The #AU - #EU relationship is a partnership between equals and a strong alliance that helps us promote our common agenda, values and interests on the world stage. Together, we can confront the challenges of our times; in unity we find strength. Happy #AfricaDay!

🇪🇺🇮🇳 Congratulation @narendramodi for the victory in the General Elections & the renewed mandate entrusted to him by the Indian people. #India has again demonstrated the impressive vitality of its democratic institutions. I am looking forward to continue deepening our engagement. https://t.co/VgoiLAUAgL
RT @EmmanuelMacron: Thank you for being here @JacindaArdern, @KingAbdullahII, @Macky_Sall, @Pak_JK, @erna_solberg, @JustinTrudeau, @theresa…
RT @AUC_MoussaFaki: The #AU- #EU partnership is a unique Continent-to-Continent relationship based on shared aspirations to contribute to g…

Îi mulțumesc președintelui @KlausIohannis pentru că a fost gazda excepționalului #SibiuSummit.

Unity matters. Together through thick and thin. This is our way to the future. #FutureOfEurope 

https://t.co/WMt8M3NGHb https://t.co/vnEFAvACNV

🇪🇺🇲🇰 Congratulations @SPendarovski on his election as President of North Macedonia. The EU reaffirms its unequivocal commitment to the European perspective of the #WesternBalkans. Looking forward to further strengthening our friendship and building a united and prosperous Europe. https://t.co/wPUfjIqXkD

🇪🇺🇯🇵Congratulations on His Imperial Majesty Naruhito’s accession to the throne. My best wishes for a long, peaceful & prosperous reign. There could be no better occasion than the beginning of a new Japanese era, Reiwa, to further develop our friendship & our harmonious relations. https://t.co/moevfBbk3Q

15 years ago on this day 10 countries took their rightful place in the heart of our Union. We seized the unique moment and reconciled Europe’s history with our geography. I remain an ardent fan of #EUenlargement 🇪🇺.

🇨🇿 🇨🇾 🇱🇹 🇸🇰 🇸🇮 🇭🇺 🇪🇪 🇲🇹 🇵🇱 🇱🇻 https://t.co/tHmmhXx0GS

When I stand in Sibiu with 27 European leaders on Europe Day, the anniversary of the Schuman Declaration, I will do so proud of our past, but even more determined and hopeful for our future.
#FutureofEurope 

Our contribution to the #SibiuSummit here:
https://t.co/tjprkujNNX https://t.co/zvvT3E5fZT

🇪🇺🇪🇸 Quiero felicitar a @sanchezcastejon  por su victoria en las elecciones generales de España. Espero tener la ocasión de discutir juntos sobre los retos de la Unión europea en la reunión de los líderes europeos en Sibiu, el 9 de mayo próximos. https://t.co/I1hPvvfD4f

🇪🇺🇯🇵 Japan and Europe are separated by thousands of kilometres but united in friendship and values! Long may it continue.

Our #EUJapan Summit Statement:  https://t.co/AXTRrQHSji https://t.co/tqP3VYahb3

Son Altesse Royale le Grand-Duc Jean a toujours été proche des Luxembourgeois qui sont aujourd'hui unis dans la même tristesse. Sa disparation est une grande perte pour le Grand-Duché et pour l'Europe. 
https://t.co/UmCt4RynzK

Congratulations to Volodymyr Zelensky on his election as President of #Ukraine. The people of Ukraine have demonstrated their strong attachment to democracy and the #RuleOfLaw throughout the electoral process. The EU will continue to support Ukraine’s reform path and sovereignty. https://t.co/g6izMPxzQM

It was with horror and sadness that I heard of the bombings in #SriLanka costing the lives of so many people. I offer my heartfelt condolences to the families of the victims who had gathered to worship peacefully or come to visit this beautiful country. We stand ready to support.

It was with deep sadness that I learnt of the tragic bus accident in #Madeira that claimed the lives of 29 fellow European citizens from Germany, and left many others injured. Our thoughts are with all the victims, their families and friends. 

https://t.co/WQu0aTnr9s

🇪🇺🇪🇪 Warm congratulations to @ratasjuri on his appointment as Prime Minister. In this important year for our Union, #Estonia is a trusted partner and I count on our continued cooperation on current and future challenges. Let’s keep working for a strong and united #Europe. https://t.co/0SafCSWgWd
🇪🇺🇬🇧 On #Brexit, nothing should be decided without taking full account of the position of the European Parliament. You can count on me for that. https://t.co/EFzPSHNOt2

Je suis minute par minute l'incendie dont Notre-Dame de Paris est la proie. Notre-Dame de Paris appartient à l'humanité toute entière.
Quelle triste spectacle. Quelle horreur. Je partage l'émotion de la nation française qui est aussi la nôtre.
https://t.co/CyBYBJZ9Q0

🇪🇺🇺🇸 With today’s adoption of the negotiating directives for trade talks, #EU is delivering on what @realDonaldTrump and I have agreed. Slashing tariffs on industrial products could lead to additional increase in EU and U.S. exports worth €26 bn. #WinWin

https://t.co/MjqiM9op4M https://t.co/eFRHmdnx00

#CopyrightDirective: When it comes to completing the #DigitalSingleMarket, the agreement on #copyright is the missing piece of the puzzle. Clear rules will guarantee fair remuneration for creators, strong rights for users and responsibility for platforms.

https://t.co/W9Ov6j7QAU

Through honesty and determination we will face our challenges together. The EU believes in China and we believe in our partnership. Ready to work together and be more ambitious in standing up for our interests and values.

🇪🇺🇨🇳 JOINT STATEMENT: https://t.co/thMDbxrqaZ https://t.co/C9EGAvFSyM

Time can never erase the darkest hours in our history. Mais c’est au cœur de nos moments les plus sombres que commence notre remontée vers la lumière.
La Rwanda est de retour dans la lumière. 
And we will never forget. #Kwibuka25 
https://t.co/HpjazITGjO https://t.co/NZx9BgKn36

I am moved beyond words at this memorial to tragedy. It serves as a bleak warning of the worst humanity is capable of. But through the darkest of days, I remain in awe at the power of regeneration, of this country, and of humankind. 
#Kwibuka25 https://t.co/0yoll7IoPK

.@presidentmt Vella, I would like to warmly congratulate you on your appointment as President of #Malta. At a time when unity & solidarity are more important than ever, your lifetime commitment to European values will prove invaluable to your country and our Union as a whole.🇪🇺🇲🇹 https://t.co/7GQ6gQJuFo

Si le Royaume-Uni est en mesure d'approuver l'accord de retrait avec une majorité viable d'ici au 12 avril, alors l'Union européenne devrait accepter une prorogation jusqu’au 22 mai.  

I will do everything to prevent a disorderly #Brexit.
🇪🇺🇬🇧

https://t.co/EOGpdIYpPr

È un piacere essere a Roma oggi per discutere con il Presidente del Consiglio @GiuseppeConteIT e il Presidente della Repubblica #Mattarella degli obiettivi comuni. L’Europa e l’Italia
sono unite nel promuovere occupazione, crescita, riforme, sicurezza e solidarietà. https://t.co/NjXQj1FDZz

A pleasure to be in Rome today to discuss our shared objectives with @GiuseppeConteIT and #Mattarella. Europe and Italy united for jobs, growth, reforms, security and solidarity. https://t.co/iPhJ70SpIX

Congratulations, @ZuzanaCaputova to your election as President of the #Slovak Republic. I am encouraged and inspired by your pro-European approach and your strong voice for tolerance, #solidarity and mutual respect - values that remain fundamental to our European project. 🇪🇺🇸🇰 https://t.co/hCPdUQN8OM
L’Europe, unie, souhaite un partenariat approfondi avec la Chine, fondé sur la réciprocité, et s’engage pour un multilatéralisme juste et efficace. https://t.co/XqoC8BcHf4
RT @EmmanuelMacron: C'est dans cet esprit que nous aurons demain un échange avec la Chancelière allemande Angela Merkel et le Président de…
RT @EmmanuelMacron: La visite d'État du Président chinois intervient à un moment où l'Union européenne est à l'heure des choix. À un moment…

Frans #Andriessen speelde een zeer belangrijke rol in het uitbouwen van een sterkere Europese Unie. Hij was een aardige, trouwe en attente collega, die ik zeer waardeerde. Europa en ikzelf gaan Frans erg missen.

https://t.co/UjMLYfPdDE

I have just spoken with @markrutte to get an update of the situation in #Utrecht. The #EU stands side by side with the #Netherlands and its people during these difficult times. My thoughts are with the wounded and their families.

It was with horror and profound sadness that I learnt of the terrorist attack on the #ChristchurchMosque. The European Union will always stand with #NewZealand and against those who heinously want to destroy our societies and our way of life. 

https://t.co/OPLLbRTg2h

Our agreement provides meaningful clarifications & legal guarantees to the Withdrawal Agreement & #backstop. The choice is clear: it is this deal, or #Brexit may not happen at all. Let’s bring the UK’s withdrawal to an orderly end. We owe it to history. 

https://t.co/lfy9eehEZi https://t.co/XCqcLwZV7V

Europe ranks among the safest and most equal places for #women in the world. The number of women in employment is at a historical high. #Europe is making progress but we must speed up change! 

#InternationalWomensDay 

https://t.co/Qg9CDD1xPY https://t.co/A4EWTk6Jm9

Mit Klaus Kinkel verliere ich einen guten Freund und einen Wegbegleiter in europäischen Fragen, mit dem ich in den essentiellen Fragen unseres europäischen Wirkens immer wieder zusammenfand. Uns verlässt ein deutscher Patriot und ein großer Europäer.

https://t.co/ySjjVbRDm5

Grateful to President @AlsisiOfficial and to all 49 European and Arab leaders for this successful #EULASSummit. We will build our future together not against each other.

https://t.co/IpaJHFsjtn https://t.co/nS0T3a5tel

C'est avec une grande tristesse que j'ai appris le décès de #KarlLagerfeld, un Allemand qui a fait rayonner l'élégance française et européenne à travers le monde entier.

Als Wanderer zwischen den Nationen kannte er keine Grenzen.

https://t.co/iisaP2XVS2

Η δικιά μου Ευρώπη είναι αυτή που συμβόλιζε ο Διονύσης Αρβανιτάκης. 
Καλό σου ταξίδι, φούρναρη της Κω που κάθε μέρα έδινες ψωμί στις πεινασμένες και ταλαιπωρημένες ψυχές. 
https://t.co/Izb1HG0hAa

With the European Pillar of Social Rights, we anchored a strong #social dimension in the future of the #EU. With today’s agreement on the European Labour Authority, we take another big step forward in delivering on our commitment for a more social Europe. 
https://t.co/xvlDcW57yL
C’est avec une grande tristesse que je viens d’apprendre la nouvelle du décès de la Sœur de Son Altesse royale le Grand-Duc Jean de Luxembourg. https://t.co/tC4MYWnV5P

Ignorance is dangerous. 
#WeRemember #HolocaustRemembranceDay 

https://t.co/EqYeEViT2z https://t.co/FUIj48MqVI

Congratulations, @krisjaniskarins. This year we mark 15 years since #Latvia joined our European family, reconciling geography and history, and five years since it joined the €-area. I count on you to continue Latvia’s active contribution to the European project. 🇪🇺🇱🇻 https://t.co/vfth6hgAeC

La France, l’Allemagne et l’Europe vont ensemble. Es braucht die deutsch-französische Freundschaft, um Europa in Frieden und Freiheit zusammenzuführen, während wir alle Farben Europas respektieren.  https://t.co/9mWzI7b9fO

🇫🇷🇩🇪🇪🇺 
#TraitédAixLaChapelle #AachenerVertrag https://t.co/aKZnvQ6mWh
Congratulations @SwedishPM on your confirmation vote. I look forward to continuing our excellent cooperation in our many areas of common interest. https://t.co/c6srlReBSZ

I take note with regret of the outcome of the vote in the @HouseofCommons this evening. I urge the #UK to clarify its intentions as soon as possible. Time is almost up #Brexit 

https://t.co/SMmps5kexn

It is with great sadness that I learnt of the tragic death of Paweł Adamowicz. On behalf of @EU_Commission, I extend our deepest condolences.
Z wielkim smutkiem dowiedziałem się o tragicznej śmierci Pawła Adamowicza. W imieniu Komisji Europejskiej przekazuję wyrazy współczucia. https://t.co/RJDthXHEAM
My reply to @theresa_may, together with @eucopresident, providing clarifications to the #Brexit Withdrawal Agreement and Political Declaration. https://t.co/f0PalJkRVu

Ich fühle mich geehrt den #LEG19 Freiheitspreis der Medien entgegenzunehmen. Ohne Medienfreiheit und Pressefreiheit gibt es keine Demokratie 

Honoured to receive the #LEG19 Media Freedom prize: Without freedom of the press there is no democracy. https://t.co/yBqipeCU3I

My sincere condolences to the families & friends of the victims and the Danish people. Lives were sadly cut short when people travelled back from the festive season. I commend the rescue services for their work & wish for a speedy recovery of the injured passengers. @larsloekke https://t.co/AoR4wLRYvr

tweets.text:
Nous rendons hommage aux 13 soldats français décédés dans un accident d’hélicoptère au Mali.

Les pensées de @JunckerEU vont aux familles et proches des victimes. Le Président présente ses condoléances à @EmmanuelMacron, à l’armée française et à l’ensemble de la nation française. https://t.co/w7poKQ5Tpp
We always found in @JunckerEU an honest broker, ready to listen and to decide. His contribution to #Europe is second to none -JM @presidentmt https://t.co/smBJsg4P2c

Thank you for being here @JacindaArdern, @KingAbdullahII, @Macky_Sall, @Pak_JK, @erna_solberg, @JustinTrudeau, @theresa_may, @LeoVaradkar, and @JunckerEU, for an unprecedented joint initiative: the #ChristchurchCall to eliminate terrorist and violent extremist content online. https://t.co/NLqIeWmG4V

The #AU- #EU partnership is a unique Continent-to-Continent relationship based on shared aspirations to contribute to global peace and sustainable development on both our continents for a shared future.  Happy #EuropeDay !
C'est dans cet esprit que nous aurons demain un échange avec la Chancelière allemande Angela Merkel et le Président de la Commission européenne Jean-Claude Juncker.

La visite d'État du Président chinois intervient à un moment où l'Union européenne est à l'heure des choix. À un moment où les équilibres du monde contemporain sont bousculés. La Chine et la France ont une responsabilité : construire les équilibres de demain.
